verses.verse: And rising <S%G450><s%> up, He went <S%G2064><s%> from there <S%G1564><s%> to the region <S%G3725><s%> of Judea, <S%G2453><s%> and beyond <S%G4008><s%> the Jordan; <S%G2446><s%> and crowds <S%G3793><s%> gathered <S%G4848><s%> around <S%G4314><s%> Him again, <S%G3825><s%> and, according <S%G5613><s%> to His custom, <S%G1486><s%> He once <S%G3825><s%> more <S%G3825><s%> [began] to teach <S%G1321><s%> them.

And [some] Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> up to Him, testing <S%G3985><s%> Him, and [began] to question <S%G1905><s%> Him whether <S%G1487><s%> it was lawful <S%G1832><s%> for a man <S%G435><s%> to divorce <S%G630><s%> a wife. <S%G1135><s%>
And He answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G5101><s%> did Moses <S%G3475><s%> command <S%G1781><s%> you?"

And they said, <S%G3004><s%> "Moses <S%G3475><s%> permitted <S%G2010><s%> [a man] to write <S%G1125><s%> a certificate <S%G975><s%> of divorce <S%G647><s%> and send <S%G630><s%> [her] away. <S%G630><s%>"

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Because <S%G4314><s%> of your hardness <S%G4641><s%> of heart <S%G4641><s%> he wrote <S%G1125><s%> you this <S%G3778><s%> commandment. <S%G1785><s%>
" But from the beginning <S%G746><s%> of creation, <S%G2937><s%> [God] made <S%G4160><s%> them male <S%G7021><s%> and female. <S%G2338><s%>
"For this <S%G3778><s%> cause <S%G1752><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> shall leave <S%G2641><s%> his father <S%G3962><s%> and mother, <S%G3384><s%>

and the two <S%G1417><s%> shall become <S%G1510><s%> <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> flesh; <S%G4561><s%> consequently <S%G5620><s%> they are no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> two, <S%G1417><s%> but one <S%G1520><s%> flesh. <S%G4561><s%>
"What <S%G3739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> has joined <S%G4801><s%> together, <S%G4801><s%> let no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G444><s%> separate. <S%G5563><s%>"
And in the house <S%G3614><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> [began] questioning <S%G1905><s%> Him about <S%G4012><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> again. <S%G3825><s%>

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> divorces <S%G630><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> and marries <S%G1060><s%> another <S%G243><s%> woman <S%G243><s%> commits <S%G3429><s%> adultery <S%G3429><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> her;

and if <S%G1437><s%> she herself <S%G846><s%> divorces <S%G630><s%> her husband <S%G435><s%> and marries <S%G1060><s%> another <S%G243><s%> man, <S%G243><s%> she is committing <S%G3431><s%> adultery. <S%G3429><s%> "
And they were bringing <S%G4374><s%> children <S%G3813><s%> to Him so <S%G2443><s%> that He might touch <S%G681><s%> them; and the disciples <S%G3101><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them.

But when Jesus <S%G2424><s%> saw <S%G3708><s%> this, He was indignant <S%G23><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Permit <S%G863><s%> the children <S%G3813><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to Me; do not hinder <S%G2967><s%> them; for the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> belongs <S%G1510><s%> to such <S%G5108><s%> as these. <S%G5108><s%>

"Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> does not receive <S%G1209><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a child <S%G3813><s%> shall not enter <S%G1525><s%> it [at all.]"
And He took <S%G1723><s%> them in His arms <S%G1723><s%> and [began] blessing <S%G7108><s%> them, laying <S%G5087><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> upon them.

And as He was setting <S%G1607><s%> out on a journey, <S%G3598><s%> a man <S%G1520><s%> ran <S%G4370><s%> up to Him and knelt <S%G1120><s%> before <S%G1120><s%> Him, and [began] asking <S%G1905><s%> Him, "Good <S%G18><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>?"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Why <S%G5101><s%> do you call <S%G3004><s%> Me good <S%G18><s%>? No <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> is good <S%G18><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> alone. <S%G1520><s%>

"You know <S%G3609><s%> the commandments, <S%G1785><s%> 'Do not murder, <S%G5407><s%> Do not commit <S%G3431><s%> adultery, <S%G3431><s%> Do not steal, <S%G2813><s%> Do not bear <S%G5576><s%> false <S%G5576><s%> witness, <S%G5576><s%> Do not defraud, <S%G650><s%> Honor <S%G5091><s%> your father <S%G3962><s%> and mother. <S%G3384><s%>'"
And he said <S%G5346><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> I have kept <S%G5442><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> from my youth <S%G3503><s%> up."

And looking <S%G1689><s%> at him, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> felt <S%G25><s%> a love <S%G25><s%> for him, and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "One <S%G1520><s%> thing <S%G1520><s%> you lack: <S%G5302><s%> go <S%G5217><s%> and sell <S%G4453><s%> all <S%G3745><s%> you possess, <S%G2192><s%> and give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor, <S%G4434><s%> and you shall have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in heaven; <S%G3772><s%> and come, <S%G1204><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> Me."

But at these <S%G3588><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> his face <S%G4768><s%> fell, <S%G4768><s%> and he went <S%G565><s%> away <S%G565><s%> grieved, <S%G3076><s%> for he was one who owned <S%G2192><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> property. <S%G2933><s%>

And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> looking <S%G4017><s%> around, <S%G4017><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to His disciples, <S%G3101><s%> "How <S%G4459><s%> hard <S%G1423><s%> it will be for those <S%G3588><s%> who are wealthy <S%G5536><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"

And the disciples <S%G3101><s%> were amazed <S%G2284><s%> at His words. <S%G3056><s%> But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Children, <S%G5043><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> hard <S%G1422><s%> it is to enter <S%G1525><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>

"It is easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eye <S%G5168><s%> of a needle <S%G4476><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich <S%G4145><s%> man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>"
And they were even <S%G4057><s%> more <S%G4057><s%> astonished <S%G1605><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Then <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> be saved <S%G4982><s%>?"

Looking <S%G1689><s%> upon them, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "With men <S%G444><s%> it is impossible, <S%G102><s%> but not with God; <S%G2316><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> are possible <S%G1415><s%> with God. <S%G2316><s%>"
Peter <S%G4074><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we have left <S%G863><s%> everything <S%G3956><s%> and followed <S%G190><s%> You."

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G5346><s%> "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, there is no <S%G3762><s%> one <S%G3762><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> has left <S%G863><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> brothers <S%G80><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> farms, <S%G68><s%> for My sake <S%G1752><s%> and for the gospel's sake, <S%G1752><s%>

but that he shall receive <S%G2983><s%> a hundred <S%G1542><s%> times <S%G1542><s%> as much <S%G1542><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> in the present <S%G3778><s%> age, <S%G2540><s%> houses <S%G3614><s%> and brothers <S%G80><s%> and sisters <S%G79><s%> and mothers <S%G3384><s%> and children <S%G5043><s%> and farms, <S%G68><s%> along with persecutions; <S%G1375><s%> and in the age <S%G165><s%> to come, <S%G2064><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>
"But many <S%G4183><s%> [who are] first, <S%G4413><s%> will be last; <S%G2078><s%> and the last, <S%G2078><s%> first. <S%G4413><s%>"

And they were on the road, <S%G3598><s%> going <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> was walking <S%G4254><s%> on ahead <S%G4254><s%> of them; and they were amazed, <S%G2284><s%> and those <S%G3588><s%> who followed <S%G190><s%> were fearful. <S%G5399><s%> And again <S%G3825><s%> He took <S%G3880><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> aside <S%G3880><s%> and began <S%G757><s%> to tell <S%G3004><s%> them what <S%G3588><s%> was going <S%G3195><s%> to happen <S%G4819><s%> to Him,

[saying,] "Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we are going <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%> and the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> will be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and the scribes; <S%G1122><s%> and they will condemn <S%G2632><s%> Him to death, <S%G2288><s%> and will deliver <S%G3860><s%> Him to the Gentiles. <S%G1484><s%>

"And they will mock <S%G1702><s%> Him and spit <S%G1716><s%> upon Him, and scourge <S%G3146><s%> Him, and kill <S%G615><s%> [Him,] and three <S%G5140><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> later <S%G3326><s%> He will rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>"

And James <S%G2385><s%> and John, <S%G2491><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> came <S%G4365><s%> up to Him, saying <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> we want <S%G2309><s%> You to do <S%G4160><s%> for us whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> we ask <S%G154><s%> of You."
And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "What <S%G5101><s%> do you want <S%G2309><s%> Me to do <S%G4160><s%> for you?"

And they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Grant <S%G1325><s%> that we may sit <S%G2523><s%> in Your glory, <S%G1391><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> on Your right, <S%G1188><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> on [Your] left. <S%G710><s%>"

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "You do not know <S%G3609><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you are asking <S%G154><s%> for. Are you able <S%G1410><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> that I drink, <S%G4095><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> I am baptized <S%G907><s%>?"

And they said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "We are able. <S%G1410><s%>" And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "The cup <S%G4221><s%> that I drink <S%G4095><s%> you shall drink; <S%G4095><s%> and you shall be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> with which <S%G3739><s%> I am baptized. <S%G907><s%>

"But to sit <S%G2523><s%> on My right <S%G1188><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> on [My] left, <S%G2176><s%> this is not Mine <S%G1699><s%> to give; <S%G1325><s%> but it is for those for whom <S%G3739><s%> it has been prepared. <S%G2090><s%>"
And hearing <S%G191><s%> this, the ten <S%G1176><s%> began <S%G757><s%> to feel <S%G23><s%> indignant <S%G23><s%> with James <S%G2385><s%> and John. <S%G2491><s%>

And calling <S%G4341><s%> them to Himself, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "You know <S%G3609><s%> that those <S%G3588><s%> who are recognized <S%G1380><s%> as rulers <S%G757><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> lord <S%G2634><s%> it over <S%G2634><s%> them; and their great <S%G3173><s%> men <S%G3173><s%> exercise <S%G2715><s%> authority <S%G2715><s%> over <S%G2715><s%> them.

"But it is not so <S%G3779><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you shall be your servant; <S%G1249><s%>
and whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> wishes <S%G2309><s%> to be first <S%G4413><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you shall be slave <S%G1401><s%> of all. <S%G3956><s%>

"For even <S%G2532><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of Man <S%G444><s%> did not come <S%G2064><s%> to be served, <S%G1247><s%> but to serve, <S%G1247><s%> and to give <S%G1325><s%> His life <S%G5590><s%> a ransom <S%G3083><s%> for many. <S%G4183><s%>"

And they came <S%G2064><s%> to Jericho. <S%G2410><s%> And as He was going <S%G1607><s%> out from Jericho <S%G2410><s%> with His disciples <S%G3101><s%> and a great <S%G2425><s%> multitude, <S%G3793><s%> a blind <S%G5185><s%> beggar <S%G4319><s%> [named] Bartimaeus, <S%G924><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Timaeus, <S%G5090><s%> was sitting <S%G2521><s%> by the road. <S%G3598><s%>

And when he heard <S%G191><s%> that it was Jesus <S%G2424><s%> the Nazarene, <S%G3479><s%> he began <S%G757><s%> to cry <S%G2896><s%> out and say, <S%G3004><s%> "Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me!"

And many <S%G4183><s%> were sternly <S%G2008><s%> telling <S%G2008><s%> him to be quiet, <S%G4623><s%> but he kept crying <S%G2896><s%> out all <S%G4183><s%> the more, <S%G3123><s%> "Son <S%G5207><s%> of David, <S%G7035><s%> have <S%G1653><s%> mercy <S%G1653><s%> on me!"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stopped <S%G2476><s%> and said, <S%G3004><s%> "Call <S%G5455><s%> him [here.]" And they called <S%G5455><s%> the blind <S%G5185><s%> man, <S%G5185><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Take <S%G2293><s%> courage, <S%G2293><s%> arise! <S%G1453><s%> He is calling <S%G5455><s%> for you."
And casting <S%G577><s%> aside <S%G577><s%> his cloak, <S%G2440><s%> he jumped <S%G7015><s%> up, and came <S%G2064><s%> to Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And answering <S%G611><s%> him, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> do you want <S%G2309><s%> Me to do <S%G4160><s%> for you?" And the blind <S%G5185><s%> man <S%G5185><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "Rabboni, <S%G4462><s%> [I want] to regain <S%G308><s%> my sight! <S%G308><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "Go <S%G5217><s%> your way; <S%G5217><s%> your faith <S%G4102><s%> has made <S%G4982><s%> you well. <S%G4982><s%>" And immediately <S%G2117><s%> he regained <S%G308><s%> his sight <S%G308><s%> and [began] following <S%G190><s%> Him on the road. <S%G3598><s%>
